name: The Inglorious Yet Highly Stimulating Life of an Underpaid Graduate Student
name_original: The Inglorious Yet Highly Stimulating Life of an Underpaid Graduate Student
description:
If the computer blue screens instantly in the embedded game, your browser is probably blocking third-party cookies. Try to unblock them or play the game directly here.The Inglorious Yet Highly Stimulating Life of an Underpaid Graduate Student

Ludum Dare 33 submission

Inspired by our net connections cutting out right after the Ludum Dare theme was announced and fun times with ISPs' phone support, we made a game where you provide terrible support to innocent civilians for sweet cash to buy more phones on ePay. You monster.

License

Code is distributed under the ISC license, and graphics under the CC BY license. See COPYING for details.

Credits

Code by Keefer Rourke and I.

Graphics by Matthew Petry and Peter Brunner.

Audio by Matthew Petry.

Thanks to Dilbert/Scott Adams for phone dialog text and inspiration.

http://kfarwell.org/projects/the_inglorious_yet_highly_stimulating_life_of_an_underpaid_graduate_student/
